channel.title: Twitter on Rob Barry
channel.description: Recent content in Twitter on Rob Barry

item.title: Fake Accounts Posing as News Organizations Prematurely Declare Election Victories
item.description: Several Twitter accounts posed as U.S. news organizations to falsely declare election victories for Democrat Joe Biden, in what appeared to be a coordinated campaign to inject disinformation into conversation about the presidential contest. Read the full story here.
